Subject: RE: Initio Kiosk Design

Hi @Majed <mailto:Majed.Alassaf@chalhoub.com>  - Thanks for installing the CCTV along with the kiosk, as per the attached email.

 

Hi @Tahseen <mailto:Tahseen.Ali@chalhoub.com>  - Appreciate the confirmation on the POS and IT setup readiness.

Hi @Majed <mailto:Majed.Alassaf@chalhoub.com>  - Thanks for installing the CCTV along with the kiosk, as per the attached email.

 

Hi @Tahseen <mailto:Tahseen.Ali@chalhoub.com>  - Appreciate the confirmation on the POS and IT setup readiness.

 

Hi @Medhat <mailto:Medhat.Alaskar@chalhoub.com>  – Please ensure the contractor installs at least six power outlets under the cash desk.

Also, let us know the number of cleaners needed for the opening, and provide the date and time to @Abdullah Alharbi <mailto:Abdullah.Alharbi@chalhoub.com> . Additionally, please share the start date and time for the permanent cleaner.

 

Hi @Tarek <mailto:Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com>   @Fahad <mailto:Fahad.Deshmukh@chalhoub.com>  – Please send the thermal invoice, insurance cover, supplies, and safe box directly to the kiosk.

 

Hi @Abdullah <mailto:Abdullah.Almadhi@chalhoub.com>  @Humedi <mailto:Humedi.Alrawali@chalhoub.com>  – Thank you for delivering one fire extinguisher and first aid kit. 

 

Regards

 

 

BILAL SHAMMAA​​​​

‑

بلال شماع
